description:
Outcasts of Dungeon is a third person fantasy action.
Being in the role of a brave wanderer, help dwarfs to defend their kingdom fortress from a rampaging mob of beastly invaders. Captured dwarfs need help and they have something to offer you as a reward.
Battle enemies through a story-based campaign across dungeon and evolve your combat skills to achive better results.
Features:
- Procedurally generated dungeons – Twisting passages, long halls and wide-open chambers all need a hero to clear them.
- Story-based Campaign – Fend off monsters across acts to discover the mysterious power behind their relentless assaults.
- Companion System - Free and protect allies from captivity and use their combat power to your advantage.
- 9 Different Enemies – Including scavengers, ghouls and a whole bunch of ugly orcs.
name: Outcasts of Dungeon: Epic Magic World Fight Rogue Game Simulator
